test.name: User Is Able To See Post Made By Another User

kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

Sleep

kw.name: Type Text In Post And Choose Public
Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'This is a public post.' into text field 'xpath=/html/body/div/div[2]/div[2]/div/div[2]/form/fieldset/div/div/textarea'.

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'xpath=//select[@name='privacy']' by label public.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.
